subject: Accidents and Safety
Fires and Firefighters
lead_paragraph: South Carolina will hold a reworked pep rally to replace the traditional Tiger Burn in the aftermath of a beach-house fire that killed seven students last month.The ceremony will be Nov. 23, a day before the Gamecocks play Clemson. South Carolina students voted to cancel the original rally, where a likeness of a Clemson Tiger is burned, in memory of the students who died. Six were from the University of South Carolina. One was from Clemson.
